title: Deaducation
description:
Today's stories are all about the bizarre things that can happen at school, and the unsettling truths that you may learn about yourself. First, Sapphire shares a story about a young girl who becomes possessed by a Jinn. Then, we'll watch a group of friends fall apart over the years. After that, we'll figure out why a history high school teacher hates one of her students. And finally, we'll learn about the history of a house that a college student is renting.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
